verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: declared] [ARG1: a major disaster] [ARGM-LOC: in Hawaii] [ARGM-TMP: after days of volcanic activity that sent molten lava and toxic fumes spewing into residential neighborhoods] .
